title: Sweets Delights Emporium
description: There's Lots Of Fun In Sweet.

services.title: Balushahi
services.description: Makhan Bada is a traditional dessert originating from the state of Bihar in Indian subcontinent.

services.title: Gulab Jamun
services.description: Gulab jamun is a sweet originating in Persia and then later introduced to the Indian subcontinent.

services.title: Rasmalai
services.description: Ras malai, also known as rosomalai, or roshmalai, is a dessert from the Indian subcontinent.

services.title: Kajukatali
services.description: Kajukatali sweet is made from Kaju , Khoa & added sugar; Decorated with edible silver paper & cardamom.
